name: TypeScript
title: A TypeScript cheat sheet with the most important concepts, functions, methods, and more. A complete quick reference for beginners.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A TypeScript cheat sheet with the most important concepts, functions, methods, and more. A complete quick reference for beginners.

cards.title: Installing the Compiler
cards.code:
npm install typescript --save-dev
npm tsc

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds **static typing**, **interfaces**, and **compile-time error checking**. It compiles down to plain JavaScript.

cards.title: Basic Types
Arrays
Tuples
Enums
Type Aliases
Interfaces
Extending Interfaces
Functions
Optional & Default Parameters
Rest Parameters
Function Overloads
Union & Intersection Types
Literal Types
cards.code:
type Alignment = "left" | "center" | "right";
let align: Alignment = "left";

cards.title: Generics
Generic Constraints
Generic Interfaces
Classes
Access Modifiers
Abstract Classes
Implements Interface
Type Assertions
cards.code:
let someValue: unknown = "Hello TypeScript";
let strLength: number = (someValue as string).length;

cards.title: Nullish Coalescing
cards.code:
let input: string | null = null;
let result = input ?? "Default";

cards.title: Optional Chaining
Namespaces
Modules
Export Default
Promises & Async/Await
Typing Async Functions
Readonly & Record
Type Guards
Index Signatures
Mapped Types
cards.code:
type Flags = { [K in "option1" | "option2"]: boolean };
const flags: Flags = { option1: true, option2: false };

cards.title: Conditional Types
cards.code:
type NonNullable<T> = T extends null | undefined ? never : T;
type SafeString = NonNullable<string | null>; // string

cards.title: Unknown vs Any
Never Type
Decorators (Experimental)
Utility Types
Keyof and Typeof
Infer Keyword
cards.code: type ReturnType<T> = T extends (...args: any[]) => infer R ? R : any;

cards.title: if Statement
Ternary Operator
cards.code: const isEven: boolean = (10 % 2 === 0) ? true : false;

cards.title: Switch Statement
For Loop
While Loop
For...of Loop
For...in Loop
Array Methods
Readonly Arrays
cards.code:
const readOnlyNums: ReadonlyArray<number> = [1, 2, 3];
// readOnlyNums.push(4); // Error

cards.title: Sets
Maps
Object Types
Indexable Types
Excess Property Checks
Namespace with Internal Modules
Try Catch
Custom Errors
Destructuring
cards.code:
const [first, second]: [number, number] = [1, 2];
const { name: userName, age }: { name: string, age: number } = { name: "Alice", age: 30 };

cards.title: Spread Operator
cards.code:
const arr1: number[] = [1, 2];
const arr2: number[] = [...arr1, 3, 4];

cards.title: Template Literals
cards.code: const greeting: string = `Hello, ${name}`;

cards.title: Arrow Functions
cards.code: const square = (x: number): number => x * x;
